Value of BASIC ON command sent to 2nd assoc group

paramInformation.description: Defines cmd sent to devices in 4th association group

paramInformation.description: Defines min level of CO concentration starting timer

Temperature reporting time interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval between consecutive reports of temperature

paramInformation.label: Temperature reporting hysteresis
paramInformation.description: Min change in temperature resulting in a report being sent

paramInformation.description: Temp level resulting in sending actions (parameters 2, 3 and 4)

paramInformation.label: CO meter activation
paramInformation.description: Activates reporting of CO concentration to controller.

paramInformation.description: Minchange in CO concentration resulting in sending new value to controller
